thread.title: Cybage Partners With Sri Lankan Conglomerate, Expolanka Holdings
thread.title_full: Cybage Partners With Sri Lankan Conglomerate, Expolanka Holdings - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Cybage Partners With Sri Lankan Conglomerate, Expolanka Holdings
text:
Cybage Software
PUNE, India , October 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Cybage Software Pvt. Ltd., a leading technology consulting organization, has entered into an agreement with a major Sri Lankan conglomerate, Expolanka Holdings, which has an annual turnover of LKR 52.6 Billion ( USD 400 million ). Cybage will be involved with system configuration and implementation of HighJump, a global provider of supply chain management software to cater to Expolanka's warehouse management needs.
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20141029/713415 )
Expo Freight (EFL), a leading international freight forwarding and 3PL organization, is a part of SG Holdings Group (annual turnover of more than JPY 857 Billion ( USD 7 Billion ), a leading logistics group in Japan .
Jagath Pathirane, CEO - Expo Freight , said, "Integrating HighJump's robust platform into our operations will help us perform efficient freight handling for ocean, air and ground transport for existing customers and enable seamless extension to new customers. HighJump platform lets us anticipate peaks and valley and mitigate those while allowing us to better utilize labour."
On selection of HighJump, David Houser , SVP for International Sales , said, "The choice of HighJump by Expo Freight (EFL) underscores EFL's focus on technology enablement of their business. We are very humbled, and at the same time, excited by this selection. This will also anchor our business and provide additional growth in the key geography."
Amit Gajwani , SVP - Business Development , Cybage , said, "The partnership with Expo Freight (EFL) is a unique and distinguished opportunity for Cybage. Moreover, Cybage also has a major thrust in the far-east market, and has established an office in Japan . With our relationship with Expo Freight (EFL), Cybage looks forward to an expansion in this geography."
About Cybage Software Pvt Ltd:
Cybage Software Pvt. Ltd. is a technology consulting organization specializing in outsourced product engineering services. As a leader in the hi-tech and product engineering space, Cybage works with some of the world's best independent software vendors (ISVs). Our solutions are focused on modern technologies, and are enabled by a scientific, data-driven system called the ExcelShore® Model of Operational Excellence®.
A highly skilled talent pool of more than 5,600 employees makes Cybage a worthy partner to technology startups, mid-size companies, and Fortune 500 corporations alike. With offices in eight countries across the world, Cybage provides seamless services and dependable deliveries to its clients from diverse industry verticals such as Media and Entertainment, Travel and Hospitality, Online Retail, Healthcare and Life Sciences, and Technology, to name a few.
About Expo Freight (EFL)
Expo Freight (EFL) is a premier provider of freight forwarding, logistics support and supply chain management solutions with a global presence in 20 countries in Asia , Middle East , Africa and the US.
The Company's infrastructure and strengths at origin mean that it can provide a complete range of solutions for every requirement. Over the years, EFL has built a strong rapport with key suppliers that guarantees priority services to the Company's customers. This rapport enables EFL to provide a holistic solution ranging from administration, materials handling, storage and transport by road, air and sea. Whether it's a programme utilizing one or more of EFL's standardized services such as freight forwarding or contract logistics, or a totally integrated, global solution configured to specific requirements, the Company's professionals can develop unique solutions based on requirements and then manage a process that will maximize value along each supply chain with high-quality, cost-effective, time-definite delivery from end to end.
About HighJump
HighJump is a global provider of supply chain management software and trading partner network technology that streamlines the flow of inventory and information from supplier to store shelf. We support more than 15,000 customers in 77 countries, ranging from small businesses to global enterprises. Our functionally rich and highly adaptable solutions efficiently manage customers' warehousing, manufacturing, transportation, distribution, trading partner integration, delivery routes, retail stores and eCommerce. For more information, visit http://www.highjump.com .
HighJump is a trademark of HighJump Software Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
To know more about Cybage, write to us at marcom@cybage.com .
